label: 六条殿
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Originally a residence of Retired Emperor Go-Shirakawa; located in the Sixth Ward west of Nishinotōin. After Go-Shirakawa's death, it passed to his daughter, Sen'yōmeimon-in, and, later, to Takatsukasa-in (empress of Go-Horikawa), before becoming a hereditary property of the Jimyō-in line. [後白河　西洞院　鷹司院　後堀河　持明院]
